Author: riseandfall#3726
Content: https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/Mastering_CryptoConditions/blob/master/all_chapters.md

Author: riseandfall#3726
Content: Impressive

Author: riseandfall#3726
Content: I wonder what is the difference between that and scriptless script (a feature which will be implemented on bitcoin once they switch to Scnhor signature) ?

Author: riseandfall#3726
Content: I know scriptless script requires linearity in signature aggregation (Shnorr offers it). KMD is based on ECDSA and doesn't propose it.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: KMD CC can implement arbitrary things, including schnorr signatures with one CC, solidity contracts with another CC, etc.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is at a totally different level

Author: riseandfall#3726
Content: yes right (didn't think about that)

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it creates a new type of output, that follows whatever new rules for that new type of output

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: each CC does

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so to compare this with some single thing...

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it seems you cant really compare them. you could compare one specific CC to it though

Author: riseandfall#3726
Content: I follow you.

Author: riseandfall#3726
Content: Guy you are amazing.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: each such CC would need to be coded, but it is possible

Author: zainshoukat590#6584
Content: @benohanlon hey guys? tell me why choose KMD when we could have Xlm, eth etc. Just for some survey.

Author: benohanlon#1119
Content: @zainshoukat590 I don't give investment advice. However, I like that @jl777c forsaw issues like congestion and security from the start. I believe in what we're doing. Lowering barriers for blockchain. Creating toolsets for devs and dAPPs. Access to a dex, wallet, indepdence etc... so if I asked myself that it would be because I believe Komodo has heart.

Author: zainshoukat590#6584
Content: @benohanlon Thats awesome explanation and convincible as well for serious investors. Looking for some more suggestions.

Author: benohanlon#1119
Content: @zainshoukat590 let's look at what most people say when they talk about Bitcoin... "it uses up too much energy, it's wasteful, it harms the planet. What Komodo has done is recycled the enormous energy that's being poured into Bitcoin (think of the hashrate as a river of electricity running through all the miners) to protect and secure other chains. That's amazing. Now Bitcoin's energy can be used to protect the small guy. To create independence. Recycling Bitcoin's energy is an excellent talking point.

Author: benohanlon#1119
Content: @zainshoukat590 you could share this live chart https://bitinfocharts.com/comparison/hashrate-btc-eth-bch-ltc.html to demonstrate how much larger bitcoin's hashrate is. Komodo offers small projects the security of Bitcoin. It's huge.
